snippet: Yahoo told dozens of employees at 15 digital publications that they were losing their jobs, part of a larger plan to cut the work force by 15 percent.
abstract: Yahoo chief executive Marissa Mayer is shutting down group of 15 digital magazines focused on topics like food, real estate and cars; editors and writers will be laid off as part of company's larger plan to cut 15 percent of its work force.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo told dozens of employees at 15 digital publications that they were losing their jobs, part of a larger plan to cut the work force by 15 percent.

headline.main: Yahoo Closes Online Magazines, a Costly Experiment by Marissa Mayer
